# WKInterfaceLayoutDirection.leftToRight

**Case**

The layout direction is left-to-right.

## Declaration

```swift
case leftToRight
```

## Constants

- **WKInterfaceLayoutDirection.rightToLeft**: The layout direction right-to-left. This value is appropriate when your app is running with localizations such as Arabic or Hebrew that should have the user interface layout origin on the right edge of the coordinate system.
